Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Really lovely restaurant. Good wine list with a great specials hand written wine book. Food was very well cooked and presented, tasted lovely. The Eel was delicious & Halibut was spot on. Staff very friendly and efficient, just one guy wasn't in the mood. Thank you

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Nice cozy place with good French food. Make sure you book otherwise is impossible to get a place. The menu is limited they could improve the options though.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Just wow! Great, creative and fresh food, one of our favorites in NL. Excellent service.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Very high quality in food and service. Fine place and ambiance with a french touch that makes it elegant without being posh. Recommended to book in advance as there‚Äôs a high demand.  Make sure to try the poached duck egg! For more experiences like this follow @quiquinnv

Name: Cafe Caron

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: The food is good but the service was sadly very slow; we had to wait 20 min for our starter to arrive... My main course was lukewarm and by the time it was reheated my partner had already finished her main course. All in all a nice restaurant with the potential to be great.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Very cozy French restaurant, good food, great service and for the wine lovers ask for the special red book

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Nice french food with a small Dutch touch. I had the Coquelet which was super tasty, it felt like my grandmother kitchen.. Service is very good, would definitely good back anytime soon

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: One of the very best meals I've had.  Service was excellent.  Thank you for a memorable evening.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: great atmosphere. Excellent food and service

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: One of the best restaurants in town. Great french cuisine, extensive wine selection and friendly professional staff who provide great service.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Incredible service and food. Compared to other restaurants in the Michelin Guide, Cafe Caron ought to have the Bib Gourmand distinction. A must in Amsterdam.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: I keep returning to this classic place. Fantastic food , unfussy but high quality. Also very interesting wine list and good advice. Lovely atmosphere with a  bar to sit at when with 2 or 3 and spacious tables for larger groups. Reservations essential in the weekend.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Great date spot. Food is good but nothing spectacular, staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. Prices are steep for what you get.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Excellent food, great curation of wine options, friendly staff, and (at least for an American) great value.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: I know I have french roots but I cannot say it enough: try this fabulous restaurant. Great food, atmosphere and staff. The changing menu makes it an ideal place to visit regularly. Ask for the special wine book if you know your stuff and embark on a tasty journey! Merci!

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Not bad, but missed big flavors.

Name: Cafe Caron

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: We had dinner in the first sitting on a packed Thursday night.  Seriously good food, amazing ingredients cooked beautifully.  Our wine was great and the service super friendly. A benchmark for what a great French Bistro should be.

Review Text: Cafe Caron ..not much to choose because they (the Chef) mainly decides himself for the day menu. Besides that they don't cary 'decaf' . The waiter was more or less in denial , the ambiance, location and athmosphere are unique and carry the true spirit of Amsterdam with a French flare.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: Top class food and wine, and excellent service, for a reasonable price. This place is hot, so you need to book a table weeks in advance.

Name: Cafe Caron
Review Text: I was not impressed. Staff was overloaded, stressed. Food was not good. Had a vegetarian oven dish, was WAY to salty, couldn‚Äôt even eat half of it. Nobody asked if I liked it. Maybe it‚Äôs a bad day, but I wouldn‚Äôt advice this place from this experience. Unfortunately.
